title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for: sets f'(1) = 0 or f'(x) = 0

1 point is earned for solves for k

1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the justification

f'( 1 )= 1 2 k−1=0⇒k=2 When,k=2,f'( 1 )=0,and,f''( 1 )=− 1 2 +1>0.
